meanings.sent1: The sun is appearing over the horizon.
meanings.sent2: The magician made a rabbit appear out of the hat.
meanings.sent3: The disappearing act was just a trick; the rabbit was hidden all along.
meanings.sent4: The stars appeared in the night sky like diamonds on black velvet.
meanings.sent5: The ghostly figure appearing in the mist sent shivers down my spine.

meanings.definition: To seem or look a certain way
meanings.sent1: She is appearing happy, but I can tell something is wrong.
meanings.sent2: The old house appears haunted with its broken windows and overgrown garden.
meanings.sent3: The cake appeared to be delicious, but it turned out to be made of cardboard.
meanings.sent4: His smile appeared as bright as the sun on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The mysterious stranger appearing at the door had an air of intrigue about him.

meanings.definition: To be present or arrive at a place
meanings.sent1: The guests are appearing at the party one by one.
meanings.sent2: The train will appear at the platform in a few minutes.
meanings.sent3: The missing cat appeared at the doorstep after being gone for a week.
meanings.sent4: The solution to the puzzle appeared in my mind suddenly.
meanings.sent5: The long-awaited opportunity finally appeared, and she seized it with both hands.
